about: Hello, I am Muttaqeen Slamat, an Aspiring Web Developer with a profound passion for everything IT-related. The wonders of technology have always intrigued me and fueled my love for coding. I am open-minded and an eager learner, consistently humbled by the vast world of web development and design. My creativity drives my passion for crafting digital experiences that resonate with users. In addition to my primary focus on web development, I have a keen interest in 3D renders and animation. Exploring the realms of three-dimensional design adds an exciting dimension to my skill set. When not immersed in the world of code, I am a dedicated gamer, exploring different realms and uncovering exciting adventures. I showcase my journey in the world of web development and share the projects that define my creative path.

education.description: Matriculated with a start to my IT interest as I took the subjects of CAT. Gained the skill of learning HTML at the school and with that help my interest grow in coding
Following year i continued my studies and went on to learn about Networking, also along side with IT Essentials.

Started in September of 2023 and currently still doing the course. Where I gaing the skills and knowledge on Css,Bootstrap, JavaScript and Vue.js. Not just learning more of coding but also helped with personal developement that helps alot not just in the workspace but to have a positive mindset naturally.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quotes: I am thrilled to introduce Muttaqeen Slamat as a potential candidate. Muttaqeen possesses tremendous qualities such as being detail-oriented, observant, and a goal-getter. He is equally comfortable working collaboratively with his peers or independently to ensure project requirements are met. Additionally, he is respectful towards everyone and has a pleasant personality.

testimonials.name: Al-Muakhir
testimonials.quotes: Working with Muttaqeen was an absolute pleasure. Their exceptional coding skills and creativity brought our website to life. They delivered on time, communicated effectively, and exceeded our expectations. We highly recommend Muttaqeen for any web development project.

testimonials.name: Carl
testimonials.quotes: Muttaqeen, a standout student at Life Choices Academy, is a top-tier front-end developer known for his meticulous attention to detail. His projects consistently reach new levels of sophistication and innovation. Beyond technical prowess, Muttaqeeen excels in communication, seamlessly aligning his work with broader project goals.

testimonials.name: Jay-donn
testimonials.quotes: Muttaqeen is a true champion of helping and creating opportunities for others. His selflessness, keen eye for potential, and unwavering dedication to making a positive impact have transformed lives. With infectious enthusiasm, he inspire and empower, turning setbacks into stepping stones. Muttaqeen is a beacon of hope in a world that needs more kindness and opportunity creators, leaving an indelible mark on those fortunate enough to know him.

testimonials.name: Razien
testimonials.quotes: I've had the pleasure of working with Muttaqeen for quite some time now and I must say so far he has been an amazing asset to the team. His abilities is to adapt to any situation which makes him an excellent team player. He works extremelly well under pressure and always delivers the most inspirational work.

testimonials.name: Rezaar
testimonials.quotes: Muttaqeen is very enthusiastic about the IT industry. He is really passionate about his work. He is also an excellent team player due to his high tolerance and positive attitude. He is incredibly easy to work with and has a very determined and focused personality when it comes to his work.

testimonials.name: Aakeefah
testimonials.quotes: Working with Muttaqeen was awesome! He really knows his stuff when it comes to web development. Super chill and easy to communicate with. I'd definitely team up with him again!
